title: Honoring Morgan Wohkittel upon the occasion of her designation as recipient of the Junior Miss Dance Award
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  honoring  Morgan Wohkittel upon the occasion of
her designation as recipient of the Junior Miss Dance Award

WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body to act, in accord with
its long-standing traditions, honoring the youth of today,  and  leaders
of  tomorrow, whose character and achievements best exemplify the ideals
and values cherished by this great State and Nation; and
  WHEREAS, Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its  long-
standing  traditions,  this  Legislative  Body  is justly proud to honor
Morgan Wohkittel upon the occasion of her designation  as  recipient  of
the Junior Miss Dance Award; and
  WHEREAS,  Morgan  Wohkittel of Endwell, New York, won this exceptional
award for her tap solo "Work Me Down" at the United States Tournament of
Dance held at Binghamton University's Anderson Center; and
  WHEREAS, This outstanding young lady has been dancing at Dance Spirit,
located in Binghamton, New York, for the past  five  years;  12-year-old
Morgan is also an assistant teacher at the dance studio; and
  WHEREAS,  Morgan  Wohkittel  exemplifies  the  best potential which is
inherent in our most precious  resource,  our  youth;  she  has  brought
enduring honor to her family and her community through her many achieve-
ments; and
  WHEREAS,  Poised  eagerly with enthusiasm and determined purpose, this
young dancer now stands honorably, with just pride  in  her  accomplish-
ments  and in eager anticipation of future challenges, understanding and
appreciating the caring counsel and support provided  by  her  teachers,
coaches and parents; and
  WHEREAS,  It  is  the  sense  of this Legislative Body that when young
people of such noble aims and accomplishments are brought to our  atten-
tion,  they  should  be celebrated and recognized by all the citizens of
this great Empire State; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
honor Morgan Wohkittel upon the occasion of her designation as recipient
of the Junior Miss Dance Award; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Morgan Wohkittel, Endwell, New York.
